projects: [{"title":"House-Market","start_date":"Jan 2022","end_date":"Mar 2022","description":"Created the project for learning firebase and all its utilities while honing my React skills even further.Description:A React website with mobile-centric but responsive and minimalistic UI, hosted on Vercel.Backend handled by Firebase, database by Firestore, authentication by Google OAuth, and error handling by React Toastify.Integrated with Radar API for fetching location of the listed properties."},{"title":"Github-Miner","start_date":"Jan 2022","end_date":"Feb 2022","description":"A React app to search Github profiles deployed on Vercel.This app uses the Context API along with the useContext and useReducer hooks for state management.Beautiful, clean, and responsive UI with the help of Daisy UI and Tailwind CSS."},{"title":"Newsapp","start_date":"Oct 2021","end_date":"Oct 2021","description":"It was my first React website that I created while learning from the youtube channel codewithharry.Description:Developed a news website using React and Bootstrap.Used NewsApi to fetch the news dynamically.Users can read trending news in India and also the latest news from various categories like sports, business, and technology.UI features like infinite scroll and loading bar for the time of data fetching."}]
